ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It is about presentation and we are supposed to present several times. We should be careful about it because making slides and preparing for presentation takes a time and sometimes it crashes what makes us busy about our own departmental assignments.
It's the English course that help people to improve their spoken English and is quite helpful.

Yes, I would recommend it to students that need to improve their English skills. However, students must be aware that the course requires availability of 4 hours per week. The course does not require substantial additional dedication apart from classes.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I improved my speaking and made a lot of friends. I really appreciate the teaching of presenting skills.
Surely, I have to make tons of presentations in the future. I could learned several techniques on them, as well as better pronunciation and vocabulary building.
It helps me improve my speaking skills, which would be beneficial for my future research communication.
I took some classes of the course but had to quit because of time conflict with other activities so I could not take full advantage of the course.
